item.title: Install Hugo
item.description: The first thing is hugo Hugo is the most popular open source static site generator, thanks to its speed and flexibility. It makes website building more fun. Hugo Installation The first thing you have to do is download the Hugo executable from: https://gohugo.io/categories/releases We will choose the file that we need and we will download it in the format that we like the most, It can be in zip, rar, etc.
